title: failed to find block with tag 12 - ICE

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
Error message is similar to the one in #6873

Compiling this : 

``` rust
 fn main(){
    let output_dir = from_str("/tmp/delete_me").unwrap();
    std::os::make_dir(&output_dir, 0b111_111_111);
    ::std::rt::io::support::PathLike::path_as_str(output_dir);
}
```

gives this error msg:

```
failed to find block with tag 12
task '<unnamed>' failed at 'explicit failure', /build/rust-git/src/rust/src/libextra/ebml.rs:220
error: internal compiler error: unexpected failure
note: the compiler hit an unexpected failure path. this is a bug
note: try running with RUST_LOG=rustc=1 to get further details and report the results to github.com/mozilla/rust/issues
task '<unnamed>' failed at 'explicit failure', /build/rust-git/src/rust/src/librustc/rustc.rs:391

```

Changing 

``` rust
::std::rt::io::support::PathLike::path_as_str(output_dir);
```

to 

``` rust
std::rt::io::support::PathLike::path_as_str(output_dir); 
```

gives: 

``` rust
path.rs:4:4: 4:47 error: unresolved name `std::rt::io::support::PathLike::path_as_str`.
path.rs:4     std::rt::io::support::PathLike::path_as_str(output_dir);
              ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
error: aborting due to previous error
task '<unnamed>' failed at 'explicit failure', /build/rust-git/src/rust/src/libsyntax/diagnostic.rs:98
task '<unnamed>' failed at 'explicit failure', /build/rust-git/src/rust/src/librustc/rustc.rs:391
```
